mapper.sql: production_plan_id AS "productionPlanId",coding AS "coding",end_time AS "endTime", theme AS "theme", origin AS "origin", execution_time AS "executionTime", user_id AS "userId", remark AS "remark", create_user AS "createUser", deptId AS "deptId", display AS "display", update_time AS "updateTime", create_time AS "createTime", update_user AS "updateUser"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_production_plan where 1 = 1
and production_plan_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.productionPlanId},'%')
and theme like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.theme},'%')
and origin like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.origin},'%')
and execution_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.executionTime},'%')
and user_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.userId},'%')
and remark like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.remark},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
